articles.title: About this site
articles.description: Some additional details about the website

articles.title: Data-Driven Ecology
articles.contents:
Data-driven Ecology
          
          
          Home
          About
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Data-Driven Ecology
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        GitHub
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        Email
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            Welcome!
            
            
            
            
            This class walks participants through the steps required
            to use R for a wide array of data analysis relevant to
            research in biology and ecology.
            The core skills we will cover are as follows:
            best practices in data retriever, management, and
            visualization
            basic knowledge about data analysis with machine
            learning methods
            beneficial practices in modeling complex patterns and
            processes
            The class is extremely participatory, where a lot of
            training modules are delivered based on the learners’
            needs.
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Data-Driven Ecology
            
            
              
                
                                    
                    
                      GitHub
